404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found.
404.description: The URL might be misspelled or the page has been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Sorry, an error occurred on our server.
500.description: Our team has been notified and is working on the issue.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page.
403.description: Please contact the administrator if you believe this is a mistake.
